name: eXpress
publications: Roberts A (2013). Thesis: Ambiguous fragment assignment for high-throughput sequencing experiments. EECS Department, University of California, Berkeley.  #UCB/EECS-2013-177
Roberts A and Pachter L (2013). Streaming fragment assignment for real-time analysis of sequencing experiments. Nature Methods.
Roberts A, Trapnell C, Donaghey J, Rinn JL, Pachter L (2011). Improving RNA-Seq expression estimates by correcting for fragment bias. Genome Biology.
description: a streaming tool for quantifying the abundances of a set of target sequences from sampled subsequences.
